entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
